subject: Standard RFP Document for Procurement of DPR Consultancy Services -Modification in Policy Circular No. 11.57/2024 dated 14.06.2024 along with costing guidelines for DPR Consultancy Services - reg.
text: HRdh <4y rTHRfgiferabrut (454 4Raa7 &1r RTAFT 4714, 4RG HAR) National Highways Authority of India T7TAA a (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 0-5 Qdi 6, 44z7-10, ERehl; 78 fealt 110 075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 3HI4 /Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAVPolicy Guidelines/Standard Documents/2024 Policy Circular No.11.60/2024 dated 05th September , 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/HO/DPRModifications/2024 (Comp. No. 237000)} Sub: Standard RFP Document for Procurement of DPR   Consultancy Services Modification in Policy Circular No. 11.57/2024 dated 14.06.2024 along with costing guidelines for DPR Consultancy Services reg: NHAI vide Circular No. 11.57/2024 dated 14.06.2024 issued the RFP Document for DPR Consultancy Services on Fixed Cost Basis. 2. In order to improve the bidder participation few Amendments have been approved in the Standard RFP Document issued vide Policy Circular referred above. The Amendments to the DPR RFP Document are attached as Annexure-A to this Policy Circular. 3 Further, broad guidelines for Cost Assessment of DPR Consultancy Assignments for various Project lengths have also been approved in order to facilitate the process for the Technical Divisions at NHAI HQ The   guidelines for Cost Estimation are attached as Annexure-B to this Policy Circular. 4. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl:: Annexure-A: Amendments to the DPR RFP Document Annexure-B: Guidelines for Cost Assessment of DPR Consultancy Assignments 'o5jo9/po14 (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord:) To: AIl Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 Hindi Division for translation in Hindi  2. Library for hosting the circular on library site: 3. Web Admin for circulation. Jad NHAL Policy Copy
